name: DOORS 98.EXE
description:
Description:

Macrohard Doors98 brings you the what-if scenario where YOU are the download bar of an old Doors98 computer. Experience the rage of pending key inputs while platforming your way above, under, or through classic desktop icons and folders you might recognise!

Goal:

You only have one shot between each checkpoint and you have a limited time to choose what to do. 

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • A or LEFT ARROW to move LEFT
  • D or RIGHT ARROW to move RIGHT
  • SPACEBAR or JUMP
  • SHIFT-KEY or SLIDE
  • ESC-KEY brings you the MAIN MENU

Controller:

  • Use LEFT STICK to MOVE
  • Press X to JUMP
  • Press SQUARE to SLIDE
  • Press OPTIONS/START to bring up the MAIN MENU

Macrohard Door98.exe Soundtrack:

Welcome to Doors98

Credits:
